attributes.action: Allow up to 10% Tax Free withdrawals from UK Pension Funds for all workers
attributes.additional_details: Because without liquidity all spending will grind to a halt, unemployment will then increase further compounding the problem until eventually everyone will be unemployed. Many higher earners are facing unemployment or unpaid leave and the potential for mortgage and loan defaults and yet have enough money invested in Pension Plans which they are unable to access due to their age.
attributes.background: To allow UK workers under the age of 55 to withdraw up to 10% of their existing Pension funds to overcome the economic hardship and enable cash to be put back into the economy. Once this cash has been withdrawn an equivalent amount should be added to the Tax Free allowance for the next 3 Tax Years.
